§6§lA Tale of Two Consequences: Intended and Unintended Outcomes of the Japan TOPIX Tick Size Changes§r

§8§oRavi Kashyap§r

§72019§r

arXiv:§c§n1602.00839§r

DOI:§6§n10.3905/jot.2015.10.4.051§r

Journal reference:§1§nJournal of Trading, Vol. 10, No. 4 (Fall 2015), pp. 51-95§r

Version:§7v7 (Mon, 1 Jul 2019 08:52:14 GMT)§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis version has a mathematical proof to show conditions under which endogeneity is resolved when doing a regression. The idea is consider the changes in the coefficients before and after an event. This theoretical
proof is illustrated using the data from ourevent study\u00a7r
